casebody.data:
WELSBACH LIGHT CO. v. CREMO INCANDESCENT LIGHT CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 26, 1907.) No. 123. Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Thos. W. Bakewell and Thos. B. Kerr, tor appellant. Louis Hicks, for appellee.

Before WALLACE, LACOMBE, and TOWNSEND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree of Circuit Court (145 Fed. 521) affirmed, with costs.
